outputs.output_descr:
Outputs:
1.   National M&E Coordination Function Strengthened
2. National M&E Policy  and Implementation Guidelines, Tools and M&E Communications Strategy/Plan Developed 
3. National Integrated Monitoring and Evaluation System Operationalized
4. National M&E  capacities   (including  capacities for the preparation of EDPRS 2) developed

donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr: The project aims to support the Government of Rwanda to address critical capacity constraints hindering the realization of the goals of Vision 2020

donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr:
Output 3.1: The existing platform for young people is adequately resourced and strengthened to include upstream support to enhance leadership and communication skills amongst university and secondary students
Output 3.2: A platform for excellence, innovation and entrepreneurship amongst Rwandan youth, especially young professionals, is established

project_descr: Capacity development for Accountable and Responsive Governance Institutions
project_title: Capacity development for Accountable and Responsive Gove
